column5: Sorry to here yer loss of a great Firend Cliff have a safe trip wit hhim one more time enjoy that time together he will be right there with ya.
Well put Cliff,hope Herb likes catfish! Joe
What a great tribute you gave to your close friend. I'm sorry to hear of your loss.
You got it, Cliff, next fish I'll say just that...
Cliff,so sorry to hear about the lost of a good friend,I,m sure that he will be remembered by everyone that knew him.  Steve
Sorry to hear it Cliff! My father-in-law also a Herb called today and he and my mother-in-law just Pat are also not doing well. Not my actual parents but I love them as much.
Sorry to hear Cliff. Next one is for you Herb.

I'd like to thank each and every one of you for your phone calls, PMs, emails, and replies. Some made us laugh, some made us cry (but in a good way), all were very much appreciated and helped so much these past few days.  From the very bottom of our hearts, thank you from the Matthews/Bignell family!
My condolences, Cliff, that's a very nice tribute to your brother-in-law, buddy, and fishing partner.  Mike
here is my justherb fish i caught it last night on lake nipissing and the beer I have tonight i will sure think of your pal!
my condonlences to you and the family. take care.
Sorry to hear that news Cliff, all the best to you and your family.

Our family is very upset to hear the news cliff,please accept our condolences at this difficult time,herb is in our prayers as is you and your family,and tommorw im going salmon fishing  and i will dedicate the first salmon to herb,and will say this ones for you!!!!! glad you now have great memories that will last forever,he truly is "GONE FISHING"   take care,   shawn & julie
Cliff and Sue, You have my condolences as well. Herb sounds like a very fortunate man to have sister such as Sue and a god buddy in yourself Cliff. I'm sure you made a huge difference in his life.
Wow, we're just back from Lakair and I'm catching up on the board.  So sorry to hear this Cliff.  You have Paul and My Deepest Sympathy.  Very sorry hon.  My heart goes out to you tonight.  Joey
God Bless You!
Couldn't say it any better!  In my prayers.... dk
Big Cliff, I am so sorry to hear of Herbs passing... My Condolences To you and Sue... A fitting Tribute to a fine Friend & Brother
My condolences to you Cliff and all who were affected by this loss! A very fitting tribute as well. HH

While he may not have been the greatest fisherman he sure could chose a fishin partner. Have a good trip down memory lane Cliff I am sure it will not be that hard to remember what kind of a man he was and the joy he inspired in the people he touched. I am sorry for the loss of someone close to you all but I am comforted by the thought he still lives in your alls heart.   Art
I hope he gets a musky...  Sorry to hear of your loss Cliff, the respect you just showed your brother in law in rememberance of his friendship is beautiful!
May his last be the best.  My condolences to you and your wife Big Cliff.  Take care  Phil
Our condolences to you and your family...and to everyone who knew him.  Our next report will have the first fish dedicated to him!!!  Cliff & Carole
My condolences Cliff.  That was a wonderful tribute post.  You have a way with words.  Jim
Best of luck on your trip Cliff, and my condolences to you and your wife.

So sorry to hear of such a huge loss Cliff.  It sounds like you had a great relationship.  Be comforted in the knowledge of what a priviledge it was to know him and may his memories comfort you going forward.  My prayers are with your wife, and you on that last fishing trip. My next fish will be for Herb and I will pause for the loss of your fishing buddy. Take care my friend.
So sorry for your loss. Beautiful tribute to an obvious great friend. Rest in peace Justherb.  Sincerely, 1leg
Cliff and Sue, what a fine tribute to JustHerb.  My condolences.  May this fishing trip be the best  John

Wonderful tribute Cliff. Sincere condolences to you and to Sue from Barbara and I. All that I can say is that he had the best fishing partner that anyone could hope for.  What a fitting way to say goodbye to your best friend and fishing buddy.  "this one's for you Herb"    ....................
My condolences Big Cliff.

Just read the news Cliff and I'm a bit shocked and at a loss for words...Give our love to Sue and you both have our deepest symphathy...  Is there anything we can do...give us a call.  Beans and Maribeth
So sorry to hear the news Cliff. I know you will make Herb's one last fishing trip a good one. Give Sue a big hug for me. Our thoughts are with you.

My sincere condolences go out to you and to everyone who knew him.  I'll be wetting my line on the French River at some point tomorrow and when i catch my first french river fish it will dedicate to JustHerb.  FOTB
my deepest condolences to you and yours  first fish this weekend is for Herb   Peps

Sorry to hear about the loss of your great friend Cliff. For sure the next fish I catch will be dedicated to him and also being a big fan of the food network myself my next beer and viewing I will remember him as well.  Mike
So sorry for your loss.  I couldn't imagine losing a brother.  It sounds like you have many wonderful memories to remember him by, that should ease the pain a bit.

A very fitting and well intentioned tribute. Sorry to hear of your loss.  Your humility in this situation is extremely noble. I've unexpectadly found dead family members and its devestating to this day.  Godspeed,  Erik
my deepest condolences to you and yours also...

Feel kinda silly chiming in on situations like this when i dont know any of the people involved.......but, My prayers go out regardless. Ive been there, its definitely not easy, but take things one day at a time.......and do LOTS of lookin up if ya know what im mean

Okay... This made me shed a tear....((((HUGS)))) for ya! Three years ago I lost my childhood friend of 45 years to cancer. We loved to fish and that is what we did the 8 months she had left here on earth. She even gave me her good luck bib overall shorts!  So for Herb & my friend Deb When I catch a big one it is to them! Hold your chin up and think of the memories you made!  May God be with you and Herbs family  Lorissa & OmegaMan
my sincere condolences cliff that was a great tribute and I hope you land a good one  Rick
Mine and Sue's Condolances to you and your family Cliff.  The first nice Smallie I catch this weekend is Herb's.  God Bless,   Mark and Sue.
My thoughts and prayers are with you Cliff and your family.  My next beer will be for Herb as well as my next fish.  Enjoy the trip Herb!
Sorry for the loss of your friend and the next fish is dedicated to him. Cheers Jeff

My brother-in-law, AKA justherb on this board, passed away some time last night, I found him this evening when I went to take him his groceries, he had passed away quietly while watching the food chanel and drinking a beer, two things he liked to do when he wasn't fishing. He had been sick for a while now surviving a very risky open heart operation only a few years ago and never really getting back up to speed. He had been in and out of hospital a few times in the past few months and was on a lot of medication.  We had been fishing buddies and best friends for more than 25 years, he was a lousy fisherman but that never stopped him from trying and we shared so many wonderful adventures. (Besides if he did start to out fish me, I would just tease him about me getting home to his sister; that would usually throw him off his game).  We have one more fishing trip to take, it was something he made me promise to do and do it I will. I will not mourn his passing, he wouldn't have wanted that but I will miss him very much.  There won't be any viewing or funeral, he had left very explicit instructions, just the fishing trip.  Next  fish you catch please say "this one is for you Herb!" he'd have gotten a kick out of that.  Forever in my heart Herb.  Big Cliff
What a fitting tribute to a fine man....God bless!
Very sad to hear, hopefully you break a record for him.
sorry you lost a close friend.  what a nice tribute to your buddy!
Cliff and Sue, our deepest sympathies
So sorry for your loss. One more fishing trip sounds like the perfect way to end the story...
Cliff and Sue , my thoughts and prayers are with you, I will make sure my next cast and beer are for Herb
So sorry Cliff. As I welcome a new life into mine, you mourn the loss of one from yours. How ironic. justherb was blessed to have known you. May he rest in peace.
That's not good news at all Cliff. I know how close you were to Herb...I just hope that Sue is holding out through all of this. My really heartfelt condolences to Herb's family and friends.
Please accept our condolences, e-mail on its way.  Jack and Jackie
My respects, hope the last trip is a good one. God bless you and keep you.  I'll dedicate my next fish to Herb.
Sincerest condolences Cliff.  I'm sure Herbs last fishing trip will be a good one. I'll dedicate one to him this weekend for sure.  Sinker
my condolences,,,and concider it done!
My condolences.I will dedicate  my first fish this weekend in the BOQ.MTP
My deepest sympathies on your loss of a good friend and fishing companion. May he rests in peace.
Sad news Cliff, and my condolances to everyone who loved him.  That was indeed a very  nice tribute to Herb.
Cliff my condolences to you and Sue,  Maureen
Our coldolences to your family Cliff,hope the next one is a trophy...TC and tight lines.......Chuck and Shelley.....
Sad news to hear first thing this morning.  Condolences to your family Cliff.
Sorry to hear Cliff. My condolences. Thankfully it sounds like he had a peaceful passing. The next fish is for you Justherb
In honor of your friend, I hope this fishing trip lands a PB.   I offer my deepest sympathy to you and all who knew and loved him.  My prayers are with you this day.
My condolences Big Cliff. Hope your last fishing trip with your brother inlaw is a memorable one.....  Chris
My condolences Cliff, sorry for your loss.
Condolences there, BC.  Tough loss.
My condolences Cliff, beautiful tribute and may your last fishing trip together be a wonderful one.  Rest in Peace, Herb.
